  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game​(java.lang.String fileFolder, GameMode gameMode) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, LevelException, VacuumException, SpriteException
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      fileFolder - Folder name where the configuration/level files are.
      gameMode - Indicates if the game is played based on turns or time.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - When there is a problem opening the configuration file.
      LevelException - When there is a level exception/problem.
      VacuumException - When there is an exception/problem with the vacuum cleaner.
      SpriteException - When there is a Sprite exception/problem.

  • Method Details

    • setFileFolder

      private void setFileFolder​(java.lang.String fileFolder)
      Setter of the field "fileFolder".
      Parameters:
      fileFolder - Folder name where the configuration/level files are.

    • getFileFolder

      private java.lang.String getFileFolder()
      Getter of the field "fileFolder".
      Returns:
      Value of the field "fileFolder".

    • isFinished

      private boolean isFinished()
      Says if the game is finished (true) or not (false). The game is finished when the field "numLevel" is equals to "MAX_LEVELS".
      Returns:
      True if there are no more levels and thus the game is finished. Otherwise, false.

    • getNumLevel

      public int getNumLevel()
      Getter of the field "numLevel".
      Returns:
      Value of the field "numLevel".

    • nextLevel

      public boolean nextLevel() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, LevelException, VacuumException, SpriteException
      Increases the total score, resets the level score, checks if there is a new level and loads the level.
      Returns:
      True if there is a next level and it has been loaded.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - When there is a problem opening the configuration file.
      LevelException - When there is a level exception/problem.
      VacuumException - When there is an exception/problem with the vacuum cleaner.
      SpriteException - When there is a Sprite exception/problem.

    • loadLevel

      private void loadLevel() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, LevelException, VacuumException, SpriteException
      Loads a new level, creating a level object and a vacuum object.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - When there is a problem opening the configuration file.
      LevelException - When there is a level exception/problem.
      VacuumException - When there is an exception/problem with the vacuum cleaner.
      SpriteException - When there is a Sprite exception/problem.

    • reload

      public void reload() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, LevelException, VacuumException, SpriteException
      Resets the level score and load the current level again.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - When there is a problem opening the configuration file.
      LevelException - When there is a level exception/problem.
      VacuumException - When there is an exception/problem with the vacuum cleaner.
      SpriteException - When there is a Sprite exception/problem.

    • isLevelBeaten

      public boolean isLevelBeaten()
      Checks if the level is beaten, i.e. zero dirts and dustballs, and the vacuum is empty.
      Returns:
      true if this level is beaten, otherwise false.

    • getBoardText

      public java.lang.String getBoardText()
      Returns a String with the board of the current level in textual format.
      Returns:
      Text-based board of the current level.

    • getLevel

      public Level getLevel()
      Getter of the field "level".
      Returns:
      Object of the level which is being played currently.

    • getLevelBackground

      public java.lang.String getLevelBackground()
      Returns the value of the background image of the current level.
      Returns:
      Value of the the background image of the current level.

    • getVacuumRatioCapacity

      public double getVacuumRatioCapacity()
      Returns the ratio capacity/MAX_CAPACITY.
      Returns:
      Ratio between vacuum cleaner's current capacity and vacuum cleaner's maximum capacity.

    • getTotalScore

      public int getTotalScore()
      Getter of the field "totalScore".
      Returns:
      Value of the field "totalScore".

    • incTotalScore

      Adds "inc" to the field "totalScore".
      Parameters:
      inc - Amount to add to "totalScore".

      Getter of the field "levelScore".
      Returns:
      Value of the field "levelScore".

    • incLevelScore

      private void incLevelScore​(int inc)
      Increases the field "levelScore", "inc".
      Parameters:
      inc - Amount to add to the field "levelScore".

    • resetLevelScore

      private void resetLevelScore()
      Sets the field "levelScore" to zero.

      public int getTime()
      Getter of the field "time".
      Returns:
      Value of the field "time".

    • getTurns

      public int getTurns()
      Getter of the field "turns".
      Returns:
      Value of the field "turns".

      private GameMode getGameMode()
      Getter of the field "gameMode";
      Returns:
      Value of the field "gameMode".

    • setGameMode

      private void setGameMode​(GameMode gameMode)
      Setter of the field "gameMode"
      Parameters:
      gameMode - Value of the field "gameMode"

    • moveVacuum

      public void moveVacuum​(int dRow, int dCol) throws VacuumException, SpriteException
      Given a movement in row axis (dRow) and in column axis (dCol), moves the vacuum cleaner. Moreover cleans the dirt.
      Parameters:
      dRow - Amount to move the vacuum cleaner in the row axis.
      dCol - Amount to move the vacuum cleaner in the column axis.
      Throws:
      VacuumException - When there is an exception/problem with the vacuum cleaner.
      SpriteException - When there is a Sprite exception/problem.

    • update

      public void update() throws LevelException
      Updates the state of the current level, e.g. decreases time/turns, move dustballs, etc.
      Throws:
      LevelException - When the turns/time is negative.

    • moveDustBalls

      private void moveDustBalls()
      Moves all the dustballs that are in the level/room.

    • getVisibleSprites

      public java.util.List<Sprite> getVisibleSprites()
      List of sprites which are visible in a GUI app.
      Returns:
      List of sprites which are visible (i.e. Dumpster, Dirt and Vacuum), i.e. they have an image.

    • timesUp

      public boolean timesUp()
      Checks if the turns or the time is up. It depends on the game mode.
      Returns:
      True if the turns or time are equal to zero, depending on the game mode.
